text: Purchased the tea bags for bridal shower favors.  I stuck on a customized sticker on the tea bags, and everyone loved it.  Great tasting tea and was delivered in a timely manner.  True to other reviews that they were all just kind of stuffed in the box in an unorganized way, but that doesn't effect the tea at all.  Would buy more in the future, if I need to make more favors.
